mosinstall.name: Ajaxtabs JP 1.6
mosinstall.author: JoomlaProdigy Guy
mosinstall.description:
THE "AJAXTABS JP" MODULE

The "AJAXTABS JP" Module for Joomla 1.0.x dynamically displays, with cool ajax effect, the latest one content item intro text from as many categories as you want. The display is similar to the tabs seen on new yahoo page

The module is based on Dynamic Drive's Ajax Tabs Content script. You can see the script in action at Dynamic Drive website HERE. Have fun!

Use Guidance

1) You have to define atleast one category or it may give you weired error!

2) Mambots will not be executed inside the content, wish I was an expert!.

3) Most of the html tags should be executed normally like Images,tables, weird characters etc.

4) The images in intro content inserted without using mosimage tag are displyed normally without being affected whether you choose custum image parameter or last image parameter.!

FOR INFO, UPDATES, REQUESTS feel free to contact me

I have one more module at present which is a modification of flexcontent module with lots of parameter added. you can download it from members page of JoomlaProdigy.com
You can also post comments, requests or discuss the module on the website.

Please show your support by rating or commenting on this module at the official Joomla Extensions page HERE.

Thank you

change log 1.6 : It should now support UTF-8 encoding so should render non english characters correctly.
(Last update: March 12th, 2007 - version 1.6)

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: source
param.label: Source
param.description: Whether content items should be fetched from category or section.

param.name: sourceid
param.label: Source IDs
param.description: Specify one or more sections/categories/items -using their IDs- whose content items will be displayed. Simply write the specified section/category IDs, seperated by a comma (e.g. 1,3,4).

param.name: tabsname_default
param.label: Name of default tab
param.description: Specify the name of the tab that will be used for the first tab.(why? You will understand it as you go down

param.name: tabsname
param.label: Name of tabs
param.description: Specify rest of the tabs name. The number of names here will be one less than the total number of categories choosen for tabs because we have already specified the first tab name above. Simply write the tabs names seperated by a comma.

param.name: count
param.label: Item Count
param.description: The number of content items to be presented (default 1)

param.name: linkedsource
param.label: Display Link to Section/Category choosen as source
param.description: This will make a link at the top of content item intro to go to the table display (if source is section) or blog display (if source category) of all the content items in the section/category. You want people to enjoy full show, don't you?)

param.name: linkedtitle
param.label: Linked Title
param.description: Make the content title linked or not?

param.name: timeformat
param.label: Time Format
param.description: Whether you want time display to be artistic or classic way?

param.name: linkedimg
param.label: Linked Image
param.description: Make the image linked to the full content item, or not

param.name: lastimage
param.label: Show Last Image
param.description: Grab the last image set in the article. How it works is that you choose an image for mosimage tag but dont click insert image in content for the image. if you have n images to show with mosimage you should have n-1 mosimage tags in content. SO the one extra image will appear in tab with content intro but not in full text

param.name: custumimage
param.label: Custom image you want to use.
param.description: Custom image to be inserted by the side of item. Image should be in stories folder and only provide image name. if you want the item displayed from a category (tab) to always have same image displayed for each intro, this is the option. Remember this option will be over rulled if you choose to display image by checking lastimage trick above

param.name: align
param.label: Align
param.description: Choose where to align the image. Left or Right? works for both lastimage and custum image

param.name: width
param.label: Image width
param.description: Width of custum image in px.

param.name: height
param.label: Image height
param.description: Height of custum image in px.

param.name: textheight
param.label: Height of tab box
param.description: If you want to avoid the flickering associated with loading of a tab specify the height of tab box here like (150px).

param.name: chars
param.label: Character Count
param.description: Character limitation for retrieved content item. Leave blank means no limit

param.name: words
param.label: Word Count
param.description: Word limitation for retrieved content item. Leave blank means no limit

param.name: readmore
param.label: Read More
param.description: Show read more link below retrieved content item or not?

param.name: custumtext
param.label: HTML
param.description: Ok this is what took me so much time to implement. You can write any html code in this box, please keep it simple as I have not tested it much, and this html will become the content of your first tab. Cool isn't it? And if you don't write anything here the first category content will become the content of first tab. Useful if you want it to show some flashnews. once you think the news is not important just delete it and tabs will shift back so that Ist cat item becomes first tab
